caption.p: Antinociceptive-like effects of compound 1 and the reference drug (k, 10 mg/kg, p.o.) in the nociceptive response of the temporal course curve of the abdominal stretching (A, * p < 0.0001) and in the total stretching (B, * p < 0.001) induced by 1% acetic acid in mice. ANOVA followed by Dunnett’s post hoc test. An asterisk indicates significant difference in comparison to the vehicle group (s.s.).
